name: ten stitch blanket
notes:
an elizabeth zimmermann inspired blanket worked in any yarn using only 10 stitches. you start in the centre and work in a sort of square spiral, joining as you go. no sewing up needed!

all my ravelry patterns are free to download but, if you enjoy them,
please consider making a donation to the british liver trust where
the money will go to fund research and support the families of
children with a liver disease. you can do this easily by going to my
fundraising page [here][1]

this pattern has been translated into 12 other languages (so far), all the translations are available as free downloads by clicking on the 'download' link.


  [1]: https://www.justgiving.com/page/frankie-brown
